document_data.name: Leiyraghon Manor
document_data.mainbody: '''Leiyraghon Manor''' was the sprawling ancestral seat of the powerful [[House Leiyraghon]] in [[Melvaunt]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: The mansion was located in the southeastern corner of Melvaunt.
document_data.Activities: The Leiyraghon family occasionally opened up the castle to the public to host tourneys and display their power.
document_data.Defenses: Twenty four private men-at-arms-guarded the castle at all times.
